fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Fly around the Town, learning all whispers that are sent for the rest of the day. 2 uses.
- Use your fire abilities to burn a path, preventing a player from visiting and/or being visited.
- Shoot your laser eyes to attack a player.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- The Dark Lord (3783) will always spawn.
- Your kills appear as "killed by a stick figure."

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Defeat The Dark Lord and protect the internet from Virabot. (See a faction win.)
